Detailed Description

template<class CONTAINER_TYPE, class KEY_TYPE>
class ContainerBounceWatcher< CONTAINER_TYPE, KEY_TYPE >

This class is a helper watcher that wraps another Watcher.

It consumes no path and is only responsible for dereferencing base pointer (as if it were a key in another container, substituting it into the container and passing it through to the wrapped Watcher.

See also:
